I wrote a little extension for JUnit [1]. This tool allows you to run
tests in mutliple threads, while maintaining an illusion for
TestResult/TestListener that all the tests are run sequentially.
This library also manages the System.out/System.err so that messages
appear in orderly fashion.

When your machine has more than one processor, or when some of your
tests are I/O-bound, this improves the test execution time.

I hope this is an OK use of this list, and I hope people find it useful.


[1] https://parallel-junit.dev.java.net/
[2] https://parallel-junit.dev.java.net/servlets/ProjectDocumentList

regards,
